name: Touggl
body:
## Touggl
An experiment to utilize NFC in a real life.
Touch a NFC tag (ex. Clipper/Pasmo/Suica card) with your Android phone, to start/stop the task on [http://www.toggl.com](Toggl).

### Requirement
* Android phone with NFC and ICS, like Galaxy Nexus
* Toggl account

### Restriction
It does not sync with your online activity on Toggl web correctly. Just use only Touggl and forget about recording at Toggl web site, stick to it.

### License

MIT.
tagline: Touch NFC tag to start/stop the tasks on Toggl.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
